name: Ferry Boat Driving Simulator: Ride Ferry Transport
name_original: Ferry Boat Driving Simulator: Ride Ferry Transport
description:
There are dozens of Tourists on the main island who are very anxious to visit all the islands near by. You are the only boat man currently available on the beach. Use your expert skills to transport them from Main island to their desired islands, as there are eight different islands tourists can go visit. You can use both tilt and steering to control your boat. Every mission must be completed in a specific amount of time or you will fail.

Features :

- Beautiful tropical view
- Realistic Graphics
- User Friendly Interface
- Latest Boat
- Intuitive boat controls
- Tilt and Steering Controls
- For kid and adults
